languages.text: "Святой Никомедас Кифа — миссионер, прибывший в Простор вместе с основателями Ордена Молота и давший им ценные наставления по колонизации Фолстоуна. Он обратил многие миры в Имперское кредо, но больше всего славен миссией по поиску захоронения святого Когнация, легендарного проповедника, покорявшего Простор тысячи лет назад и оставившего после себя множество реликвий. Часть из них он отыскал, и в честь его силового молота Заряд благочестия, принадлежавшего святому Когнацию, Орден и получил свое имя".

"Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."
languages.original_text: "Святой Никомедас Кифа — миссионер, прибывший в Простор вместе с основателями Ордена Молота и давший им ценные наставления по колонизации Фолстоуна. Он обратил многие миры в Имперское кредо, но больше всего славен миссией по поиску захоронения святого Когнация, легендарного проповедника, покорявшего Простор тысячи лет назад и оставившего после себя множество реликвий. Часть из них он отыскал, и в честь его силового молота Заряд благочестия, принадлежавшего святому Когнацию, Орден и получил свое имя".

traits.locale_text: "Saint Nicomedas Cephas is a missionary who had arrived at the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer and who gave them valuable instructions for colonising Foulstone. He have converted many worlds into the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his mission of searching for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind many relics. Cephas found some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, 'Piety Charge'."

"Saint Nicomedas Cephas is a missionary who had arrived at the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer and who gave them valuable instructions for colonising Foulstone. He have converted many worlds into the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his mission of searching for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind many relics. Cephas found some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, 'Piety Charge'."

He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind a scores of relics. Cephas was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, 'Pious Charge'."

Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

languages.text: “圣尼科梅迪斯·基弗是位传教士，跟随重锤修会的创始人一起来到了科罗努斯扩区，为在殖民荒寂岩地的过程中提供了宝贵的指导。他让许多世界皈依了帝国信仰，但他最著名的功绩是寻找传说中的布道士圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的墓地。数千年前，圣科尼亚蒂乌斯征服了科罗努斯扩区，留下了大量遗迹，而基弗找到了其中部分遗迹。重锤修会正是根据圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的动力锤‘虔诚冲锋’命名的。”
languages.original_text: "Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

traits.locale_text: “圣尼科梅迪斯·基弗是位传教士，跟随重锤修会的创始人一起来到了科罗努斯扩区，为在殖民荒寂岩地的过程中提供了宝贵的指导。他让许多世界皈依了帝国信仰，但他最著名的功绩是寻找传说中的布道士圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的墓地。数千年前，圣科尼亚蒂乌斯征服了科罗努斯扩区，留下了大量遗迹，而基弗找到了其中部分遗迹。重锤修会正是根据圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的动力锤‘虔诚冲锋’命名的。”

languages.text: «San Nicomedes Keefe es un misionero que llegó a la Extensión junto a los fundadores de la Orden del Martillo y les ofreció sus valiosos conocimientos para colonizar Rocainmunda. Convirtió muchos mundos al Credo imperial, pero su hazaña más famosa fue la búsqueda del lugar de descanso del legendario predicador san Cognatius, que conquistó la Extensión hace miles de años y dejó tras de sí decenas de reliquias. Keefe fue capaz de localizar algunas de ellas. El nombre de la Orden proviene del martillo de energía de san Cognatius, Carga Pía».
languages.original_text: "Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

traits.locale_text: «San Nicomedes Keefe es un misionero que llegó a la Extensión junto a los fundadores de la Orden del Martillo y les ofreció sus valiosos conocimientos para colonizar Rocainmunda. Convirtió muchos mundos al Credo imperial, pero su hazaña más famosa fue la búsqueda del lugar de descanso del legendario predicador san Cognatius, que conquistó la Extensión hace miles de años y dejó tras de sí decenas de reliquias. Keefe fue capaz de localizar algunas de ellas. El nombre de la Orden proviene del martillo de energía de san Cognatius, Carga Pía».

languages.text: 「聖ニコメダス・キーフは、鉄槌の修道会の創設者たちとともにエクスパンスに到着した聖務団の一人であり、ファウルストーンを植民地化するための貴重な指針を提供した者でもあります。彼は多くの惑星を帝国信条集に改宗させました。だが、彼の最も有名な功績は、数千年前にエクスパンスを征服し、多くの聖遺物を残した伝説のプリーチャーである聖コグナティウスの埋葬地を調査したことでした。キーフはその遺物のいくつかを探し出すことができました。この修道会は、聖コグナティウスの強力な鉄槌、正義の突撃にちなんで名づけられました」
languages.original_text: "Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

traits.locale_text: 「聖ニコメダス・セファスは、鉄槌の修道会の創設者たちとともにエクスパンスに到着した聖務団の一人であり、ファウルストーンを植民地化するための貴重な指針を提供した者でもあります。彼は多くの惑星を帝国信条集に改宗させました。だが、彼の最も有名な功績は、数千年前にエクスパンスを征服し、多くの聖遺物を残した伝説のプリーチャーである聖コグナティウスの埋葬地を調査したことでした。セファスはその遺物のいくつかを探し出すことができました。この修道会は、聖コグナティウスの強力な鉄槌、'敬虔な特務'にちなんで名づけられました」

「聖ニコメダス・セファスは、鉄槌の修道会の創設者たちとともにエクスパンスに到着した聖務団の一人であり、ファウルストーンを植民地化するための貴重な指針を提供した者でもあります。彼は多くの惑星を帝国信条集に改宗させました。だが、彼の最も有名な功績は、数千年前にエクスパンスを征服し、多くの聖遺物を残した伝説のプリーチャーである聖コグナティウスの埋葬地を調査したことでした。セファスはその遺物のいくつかを探し出すことができました。この修道会は、聖コグナティウスの強力な鉄槌、'敬虔な特務'にちなんで名づけられました」

languages.text: « Saint Nicomède Keefe était un missionnaire qui avait rejoint les Étendues aux côtés des fondateurs de l'Ordre du Marteau et leur offrait de précieux conseils pour la colonisation de Rochepeste. Il a converti de nombreux mondes au Credo Impérial, mais son plus grand exploit reste sa quête de la sépulture du plus légendaire des prêcheurs, Saint Cognatius, qui avait conquis les Étendues il y a des millénaires et légué à l'univers une multitude de reliques. Keefe a été en mesure de retrouver la trace de plusieurs de ces objets sacrés. L'Ordre lui-même tient son nom du marteau du saint, "Charge de Piété". »
languages.original_text: "Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

Il a converti de nombreux mondes au Credo Impérial, mais son plus grand exploit reste sa quête de la sépulture du plus légendaire des prêcheurs, Saint Cognatius, qui avait conquis les Étendues il y a des millénaires et légué à l'univers une multitude de reliques. Keefe a été en mesure de retrouver la trace de plusieurs de ces objets sacrés. L'Ordre lui-même tient son nom du marteau du saint, "Charge de Piété". »

languages.text: "Der Heilige Nicodemes Keefe ist ein Missionar, der gemeinsam mit den Gründern des Ordens des Hammers in die Ausdehnung kam und ihnen bei der Kolonisierung von Foulstone wertvolle Ratschläge gab. Er hat viele Welten zum imperialen Glauben bekehrt, doch seine berühmteste Tat war die Suche nach der Grabstätte des Heiligen Cognatius, eines legendären Predigers, der die Ausdehnung tausend Jahre zuvor erobert und unzählige Reliquien hinterlassen hatte. Keefe konnte einige dieser Relikte aufspüren. Der Orden wurde nach dem Energiehammer des Heiligen Cognatius benannt, 'Frommer Schlag'."
languages.original_text: "Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."

Er hat viele Welten zum imperialen Glauben bekehrt, doch seine berühmteste Tat war die Suche nach der Grabstätte des Heiligen Cognatius, eines legendären Predigers, der die Ausdehnung tausend Jahre zuvor erobert und unzählige Reliquien hinterlassen hatte. Keefe konnte einige dieser Relikte aufspüren. Der Orden wurde nach dem Energiehammer des Heiligen Cognatius benannt, 'Frommer Schlag'."

"Der Heilige Nicomedas Cephas ist ein Missionar, der gemeinsam mit den Gründern des Ordens des Hammers in die Ausdehnung kam und ihnen bei der Kolonisierung von Foulstone wertvolle Ratschläge gab. Er hat viele Welten zum imperialen Glauben konvertiert, doch seine berühmteste Tat war die Suche nach der Grabstätte des Heiligen Cognatius, eines legendären Predigers, die Ausdehnung eintausend Jahre zuvor erobert und unzählige Reliquien hinterlassen hatte. Cephas konnte einige dieser Relikte aufspüren. Der Orden wurde nach dem Energiehammer des Heiligen Cognatius benannt, 'Frommer Ansturm'."

languages.text: "Aziz Nicomedes Keefe, Çekiç Tarikatı kurucularıyla birlikte Enginlik'e gelerek onlara Menfurtaş'ta koloni kurmada yol gösteren bir misyonerdir. Pek çok dünyayı İmparatorluk İtikadı'na yönlendirmiştir ancak en meşhur başarısı, binlerce yıl önce Enginlik'i fethederek geride çok sayıda yadigâr bırakan efsanevi vaiz Aziz Cognatius'un kabristanını arayışı olmuştur. Keefe, bu yadigârlardan bazılarının izini bulmayı başarmıştır. Tarikat, adını Aziz Cognatius'un güç çekici olan Sofunun Kültefi'nden almıştır."
languages.original_text: "Saint Nicomedes Keefe is a missionary who arrived in the Expanse alongside the founders of the Order of the Hammer, offering them valuable guidance for colonising Foulstone. He converted many worlds to the Imperial Creed, but his most famous feat was his search for the burial site of the legendary preacher, Saint Cognatius, who conquered the Expanse thousands of years ago, leaving behind scores of relics. Keefe was able to track down some of those relics. The Order was named after the power hammer of Saint Cognatius, Piety's Charge."
